BattleEffectText.Name: Blood
BattleEffectText.Desc: Blood doesn't do anything Passively. It's utilized by some cards in Irah's deck and his Passive Ability.

BattleEffectText.Name: Solified Blood
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain {0} Haste, Power, Protection, Light and Draw {0} additional Page at the end of the Scene. (Up to 3)

BattleEffectText.Name: Mana Stack
BattleEffectText.Desc: It increases when a Page is used. It is utilized by some cards in Zerk's deck.

BattleEffectText.Name: Hunting Notes
BattleEffectText.Desc: Effect that keeps track of the Note (Page #{0}), last used in the correct order. (Current Symphony: {0})

BattleEffectText.Name: Dreams
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dreams are volatile, and often go in unpredictable ways. Thus, you have a 25% chance of dealing a "Crit" (deals DMG as if it were Fatal). When having 15 or more dreams, on round start, at a 25% chance that the librarian obtains a random buff or debuff, this continues until nothing is obtained. This will consume 12 dreams regardless of how many buffs or debuffs were applied. Librarian forgets 2 Dreams per turn.

BattleEffectText.Name: Nightmares
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 1 Strength, 2 Fragile, 2 Disarm per Nightmare. Gain 2 Haste. Set Break resistances to Fatal. On Round End, take Break DMG equal to Nightmare. On Taking Damage and on Round End lose 1 Nightmare.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pitiful Empathy
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 1 Strenght and 3 Damage Up per Stack. If only has 1 Stack, Link Up with another character. Take half the Damage of the other. If any is Staggered or Killed both are. If there is no other character, set Stack to 3.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stardust
BattleEffectText.Desc: If hit by a Page that Burst's Stardust, deal Stagger DMG based on the Amount and halve the stack. On Hit lose 1~2 stacks of Stardust. For every 20 Stacks of Stardust Dice gain 1 Power. If bursted at 30 or more deal half the stack as Damage (This is a true Burst).

BattleEffectText.Name: E.G.O
BattleEffectText.Desc: Max HP increases to 300. Lose 5 HP [On Use]-sing a Page. Inflict 1 Stardust [On Hit]. Lose 10 HP and gain 2 Power at Scene End.

BattleEffectText.Name: 时间轴
BattleEffectText.Desc: Caution, these buffs can go into Negatives: - Max Value: 10 - Min Value: -10 - Gain +1 Haste per 3 count. - Gain +1 Power per 5 count. - Gain +1 Max Roll Up per 2 count.

BattleEffectText.Name: Max Roll Up
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase the Max Roll of all dice by {0} for the duration of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Boiling Point
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of the Scene, turn any excess BP into burn. Once the total amount of burn applied is 30 or more, Yaren will Distort. ({0}/100)

BattleEffectText.Name: Chain Reaction
BattleEffectText.Desc: When the afflicted individual is hit, there’s a 33% chance they take the same amount of DMG that triggered this effect and reduce count by 1. Additionally there's a 25% chance of triggering Chain Reaction on another teammate afflicted with this same effect but with half the DMG. Lose 1 stack on Scene End.
